channel.title: cli on cekrem.github.io
channel.description: Recent content in cli on cekrem.github.io

item.title: create-elm-live-app – the smallest npm package ever?
item.description: The problem I’ve been tinkering a bit with Elm lately. The super-enforced functional and minimal paradigm is very refreshing, and serves as a sort of detox after spending one too many hour stuck in Android’s not-so-lovely XML + mutating class world. Setting up a new bare minimum Elm app should be quite simple, but it turns out that there are a few more steps required than one would expect.

item.title: pretty-git-report – a CLI to give you daily commit metrics
item.description: Have you ever… Wanted to track your daily additions and deletions without leaving your beloved terminal? Busted your back piping git log {insert-hundred flags} through endless hoops trying to create a somewhat human readable and useful output? Wanted to use a functional node.js cli with an immoral amount of Rambda usage? (Sorry about that, btw, I just wanted to see how far I could go. Quite far, it turns out!
